test_feedinput() none

add key sequence to input buffer

null value for testing

null value for testing

null value for testing

null value for testing

null value for testing

test_settime({expr}) none

set current time for testing

timer_info([{id}]) List

information about timers

timer_pause({id}, {pause}) none

pause or unpause a timer

timer_start({time}, {callback} [, {options}]) Number

create a timer

timer_stop({timer}) none

stop a timer

timer_stopall() none

stop all timers

tolower({expr}) String

the String {expr} switched to lowercase

toupper({expr}) String

the String {expr} switched to uppercase

menu: translate chars of {src} in {fromstr}to chars in {tostr}
info:
tr({src}, {fromstr}, {tostr}) String

trunc({expr}) Float

truncate Float {expr}

type({name}) Number

type of variable {name}

undofile({name}) String

undo file name for {name}

undotree() List

undo file tree

menu: remove adjacent duplicates from a list
info:
uniq({list} [, {func} [, {dict}]]) List

values({dict}) List

values in {dict}

virtcol({expr}) Number

screen column of cursor or mark

visualmode([expr]) String

last visual mode used

wildmenumode() Number

whether 'wildmenu' mode is active

win_findbuf({bufnr}) List

find windows containing {bufnr}

win_getid([{win} [, {tab}]]) Number

win_gotoid({expr}) Number

menu: get tab and window nr from window ID

win_id2win({expr}) Number

winheight({nr}) Number

winline() Number

winnr([{expr}]) Number

menu: returns command to restore window sizes
info:
winrestcmd() String

winrestview({dict}) none

winsaveview() Dict

winwidth({nr}) Number

width of window {nr}

wordcount() Dict

get byte/char/word statistics
